casebody.data:
CHAVEZ, et al.
v.
CARMICHAEL 437PA18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 5, 2019 Sean F. Perrin, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Carmichael, Irwin (Sheriff). Sejal Zota, Attorney at Law, W. Rob Heroy, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Chavez, Carlos, et al. Erez Reuveni, Attorney at Law, Joshua S. Press, Attorney at Law, Gill P. Beck, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for United States. R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for the State of North Carolina.

Amended

The following order has been entered on the Unopposed Motion to Extend Deadline for Filing Petitioner-Appellants' Opening Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of April 2019."

Petitioner-Appellants' shall have up to and including the 29th day of May 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
